meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of stubble.
meanings.sent1: The farmer's face was stubblier after a long day of work in the fields.
meanings.sent2: The field looked stubblier after the harvest season.
meanings.sent3: The stubblier terrain made it tricky for the hikers to find a smooth path.
meanings.sent4: His stubblier beard was a sign of his rugged outdoor lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The stubblier landscape reminded her of a prickly carpet underfoot.

meanings.sent1: The cat's tongue felt stubblier than expected when it licked my hand.
meanings.sent2: The old rug was stubblier than the new one, making it less comfortable to walk on.
meanings.sent3: The stubblier brush made it challenging to paint smooth lines on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: His stubblier hands were evidence of his hard work in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The stubblier fabric irritated her sensitive skin, causing a rash to develop.

meanings.sent1: The stubblier field looked like a patchwork quilt of different shades of green.
meanings.sent2: Her stubblier hair gave her a rugged, outdoorsy appearance.
meanings.sent3: The stubblier carpet in the room made it seem more rustic and cozy.
meanings.sent4: The stubblier texture of the painting added depth and dimension to the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The stubblier scent of the hay brought back memories of the countryside.
